samples.question: The first question is do you think celebrities should necessarily be good at their field?
samples.transcript: I think it is a fourcon conclusion that celebrities have to have to excel in their field. I am not sure exactly sure how to put this into words, but I feel like celebrities have to have something behind their names other than just their fame in order to become famous and to be popular among the people. personally, I think that there are a couple of people that do not deserve the title of celebrities. I will not mention their names here, but I think that talent is what is something that that can keep a celebrity going for a long time. for example Taylor Swift I mean she has been around in the industry for for 20 years now actually and she has been going on very strong and I think it is solely thanks to her thanks to her music and thanks to her all of the talents and all the repertoire that she has and on the other hand if you look at some other celebrities you will notice that that some of them have fallen out actually and you know and you do not see their names in presses or or in headlines anymore. more and that is I think that is definitely a must if the celebrity want to become if they want to have a sustainable career in this industry then definitely talent is a must.

samples.question: So what do you think are the differences between famous people today and those in the past?
samples.transcript: The first thing that comes to me the most striking difference is their presence on social media. back in the days well social media was not was not there at the time and celebrities at the time mainly used their talent to advertise themselves and traditional media for example TV or t commercials you know they only how to say this they were not on the media quite as often and so it was really hard for the audience to to get to know them as a person and as However, nowadays you as you can see there are multiple social media platforms that celebrities can advertise themselves on Facebook, Tik Tok, Instagram, you name it and even they can celebrities can get an additional source of income from these platforms. So really nowadays you you literally see them everywhere you go and yeah I think that is the most significant difference between celebrities nowadays and in the past.

samples.question: And do you think the media is putting too much attention on famous people?
samples.transcript: I think that it depends on which famous people we are talking about. I mean, if the person is famous and influential like Taylor Swift, then yes, I think it is definitely the case. Mhm. I think that the media is really scrutinizing her and funnily funnily enough she has mentioned this multiple times in her songs and I think this is the same situation for other influential celebrities. However, if the person is famous but they are not influential at all, then there is no really any reason for the media to pay attention to them. And I am speaking this from the perspective of them of those agencies. And yeah, so I think that it ultimately comes down to the level of influence that these celebrities have on the on the society.

samples.question: And when do you normally listen to music?

samples.question: Which communication skills are most important when taking part in meetings with colleagues?
samples.transcript: Wow. Okay. So there are so many things that a good employee needs to have in order to basically bring benefit to the table, you know. So I feel like the basic thing is probably the ability to compromise. You have to be good at compromising and also I guess negotiation is also quite a useful skill to have nowadays because you do not always get your way. So sometimes you have to compromise and sometimes you have to I do not know like hold your ground but you have to know where the balance is where that sweet spot is. So I guess these two probably skills are the most important ones nowadays. Okay.

samples.question: And what are the possible effects of poor written communication skills at work?

samples.question: And what do you think will be the future impact of technology on communication in the workplace?
samples.transcript: Wow that is a hard one. So I guess if I were to take a period of I do not know like 20 30 years I believe even nowadays we are already seeing some developments in AI and I have recently seen this I do not know like video where they are saying where where they show that you do not really have to know the language. This AI tool helps you to basically translate simultaneously as you are speaking. So I feel like it would probably make the job much easier because you will be able to communicate with people from other countries without having to learn their language. So I think that is probably one of the basic change you are going to see in the foreseeable future.
